Class HealthInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • HealthInspector
  • public class HealthInspector
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Health Inspector will enter the restaurant and linger for a while. During this time, Health Inspector will fine the resturant if they see a pest and may reduce the star rating. When Health Inspector spots a rat, they will immediately leave, fine, and reduce star rating by 1.0. Amy completed the majority of this class. Evan made minor adjustments. Images from https://iconscout.com.
    Version:
    3 (12/05/2020)
    Author:
    Amy Cheung
